entries.abort: We're not going to make it without you!
entries.arrival_phase_1: Fly to the Tyyyn nebula. A weak distress signal is coming from there...
entries.arrival_phase_2: I have a location for that civilian transport! Fly there, dock with the starship and jump-start their repair system.
entries.attack_notify: pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: pcontrast1 Hostile fighters incoming!
entries.attack_stopped: pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: pcontrast1 Hostile fighters eliminated.
entries.autorewardbody: The Ghrag mercenaries are becoming a real threat! Thank the maker you were available to save this civilian transport. Who knows what might have happened otherwise!
entries.complete: Fantastic! The civilians are safely on their way to their final destination. Good job!
entries.docking_complete: Okay! The transport has drawn enough power to get under-way.
entries.docking_started: Perfect! As soon as you're docked the civilian transport will start drawing power from your ship.
entries.failed_destroy: No! No! The transport has been destroyed!
entries.panic_2: We can't take much more of this!
entries.quest_dock_d: The civilian transport needs a power-boost to restart its internal repair systems. Dock with the starship so they can begin the exchange.
entries.quest_dock_t: Dock with the Civilian Transport to transfer power
entries.quest_escort_d: The civilian transport is powered up and ready to continue its journey. Escort it to the Kashyyyk space station so that it can make a safe jump to hyperspace.
entries.quest_escort_t: Escort the Civilian Transport to the Kashyyyk space station
entries.quest_location_d: Fly to the Tyyyn nebula in the Kashyyyk system. The Ghrag have set up an ambush here.
entries.recovery_success: Thanks! Our repair systems are coming back on-line!
entries.rescue_abandoned: No! We're not going to make it!
entries.rescue_phase_1: We need power to restart our repair system. We'll take it from your ship when you dock with us!
entries.rescue_phase_2: Thanks! Our repair system is fully-charged!
entries.taunt_2: Step aside pilot! This prize is mine!
entries.taunt_3: What are you? Rebel? Imperial? Who cares?! You die now!
entries.taunt_5: You will not survive this fight!
entries.thanks_2: Oh yeah! More of that, please!
entries.thanks_3: That's it! That's the way you do it!
entries.title: Rescue a damaged Civilian Transport in the Tyyyn nebula
entries.title_d: The Ghrag mercenaries have boldly announced their intentions to disrupt civilian traffic throughout Kashyyyk space.
